About Me

I am a multidisciplinary creative and engineer with experience in UI/UX Design, Website Development, Branding, Photography, Videography, and Embedded Systems (IoT). I combine creativity and engineering to design solutions that are visually appealing, highly functional, and user-centered.

With a background in Computer Engineering, I enjoy transforming concepts into digital products — whether it’s a responsive website, a brand identity, or an IoT-powered prototype. I approach every project with curiosity, attention to detail, and a commitment to excellence.

I love learning, building, and collaborating with individuals or businesses looking to bring their ideas to life.

Start exploring and book your next stay today.

What I Do
